BurgerIm Mobile App

I chose to redesign BurgerIM's mobile app because, my wife and I eat here. We love the food but the process in ordering online isn't easy so we're stuck calling in and waiting for someone to pick up instead of utilizing their existing app. In additon, many of their app reviews expressed frustration with the app's faulty location selection. (View Here) Their app doesn't allow you to pick the nearest location despite having a map feature. Also, the app doesn't allow you to choose a pick up time which I think will help during rush hours. Therefore, I redesigned the app because these are all components that their existing application lacks from a customer's perspective. The lack of userability can result in a missed sale.
